job.title: Software Engineer

eCommerce platform internal systems for complex server manufacturing execution and beyond Our team is small so youll have impact across many facets of our software development evolutionbrbrWhat Youll Dobrul liImplement and maintain new features used by both external and internal customersli liUphold Lambdas high standards in security software architecture engineering and privacyli liWork along the execution system to help us improve companywide manufacturing throughputli liAdd dashboards to help our team better understand and execute on company metrics amp summary statistics  Quick Company Highlights li liOur research papers have been accepted into the top machine learning and graphics conferences including ICCV SIGGRAPH Asia NeurIPS and ACM Transactions on Graphics TOGli liProfitable
